attributes.action: Prove that a Monkey is more effective than Gordon Brown.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge you Mr Blair before you leave behind your loyal followers to prove Gordon Brown to be not the right man for the job by employing a monkey as the Chanceller. If we had a monkey point to the options we give him i'm sure that we could have a much better economy

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
